meanings.definition: A thin, lightweight foam material used to wrap around limbs before applying athletic tape.
meanings.sent1: Before taping my ankle, I put on some prewrap to protect my skin.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often use prewrap to prevent irritation from the tape.
meanings.sent3: The colorful prewrap made my leg look like a rainbow before the game.
meanings.sent4: Her leg was like a delicate gift, wrapped in prewrap before the big race.
meanings.sent5: The prewrap felt soft and gentle against my skin as I wrapped it around my wrist.

meanings.definition: To wrap with prewrap before taping.
meanings.sent1: I always prewrap my knee before applying the tape for extra support.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to prewrap your wrist before taping it to avoid any discomfort.
meanings.sent3: He decided to prewrap his entire arm just for fun before the game.
meanings.sent4: She prewrapped her ankle like a present before securing it with tape.
meanings.sent5: The athlete carefully prewrapped his fingers before the competition to ensure a good grip.
